parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description: The listener port that you want to disable. Valid values: **1** to **65535**.

parameters.name: ListenerProtocol
parameters.description:
The frontend protocol that is used by the ELB instance.

>  This parameter is required if the same port is used by listeners that use different protocols.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the ELB instance.
